XXmspram_u:2: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma /
XXmspram_u:3: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate dakṣiṇe pārśve buddhagocare ratnavṛkṣe prabhāse vanaṣaṇḍe mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ //
XXmspram_u:24_0: evaṃ pramukhair ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśatais tasmiṃś ca samaye bhagavān sabhikṣusaṃgho
XXmspram_u:24_1: māgadhena rājñājātaśatruṇā vaidehīputreṇa satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito 'rcito
XXmspram_u:25: tena khalu samayena vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ mahān bhūmicālo 'bhūd abhrakūṭaṃ ca prādurbhūtam /
XXmspram_u:26: mahati cākālavātāśanir mahāmeghaś ca samutthito devo garjati guḍaguḍāyati vidyutaś ca niścaranti /
XXmspram_u:29: candrasūryau na prabhavato na tapato na virocato na ca prabhāsvarau bhavataḥ //
XXmspram_u:30: atha bhagavān adrākṣīd divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakena vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ tāni bhayāni prādurbhūtani /
XXmspram_u:31: [Mps_2] apy ekatyānāṃ vaiśālakānāṃ licchavīnāṃ yā grāmāntaḥ purīṣābhūtair adhiṣṭhitā abhisaṃsṛṣṭā /
XXmspram_u:32_1: bhūtair abhibhūtāḥ samantataś ca vaiśālījanapade yā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā bhītās
XXmspram_u:32_2: trastāḥ saṃvignāḥ saṃdṛṣṭaromakūpajātā ūrdhvamukhāḥ prakrandanto buddhadharmasaṃghān namasyanti //
XXmspram_u:33: ye ca brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo buddhaśāsane nābhipannās te cāpy ekatyā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo brāhmaṇaṃ namasyanti /
XXmspram_u:34: kecit punaḥ śakraṃ kecil lokapālān namasyanti /
XXmspram_u:36: kathaṃ nāmaitad syād vayam evaṃrūpād upadravato bhayasthānāt parimucyema iti //
XXmspram_u:37_0: atha bhagavāṃs tathā rūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram akāśīd yathā rūpeṇa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtena
XXmspram_u:37_1: trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ svareṇa vijñāpya sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ prasādya
XXmspram_u:38_0: atha brahmā sahāpatir brahmakāyikāś ca devāḥ śakraś ca devānām indro devāś ca trayastriṃśāś
XXmspram_u:38_1: catvāraś ca mahārājānaś caturmahārājakāyikāś ca devā aṣṭāviṃśatiś ca mahāyakṣasenāpatayo
XXmspram_u:38_2: dvātriṃśac ca mahāyakṣanagnā hārītī ca saputrikā saparivārā atikrāntavarṇā atikrāntāyāṃ
XXmspram_u:38_3: rātrau kevalaṃ kalyaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvataṃ svakena varṇānubhāvenodāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya
XXmspram_u:39: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte sthitā ekavāgekasvaraikapadena bhagavantaṃ gāthābhir abhituṣṭuvuḥ //
XXmspram_u:44: parvato vā suvarṇasya niṣkaṃ jambūnadasya vā //
XXmspram_u:45: candro vā vimale vyomni nakṣatrebhiḥ puraskṛtaḥ //
XXmspram_u:47: lokaḥ sadevako hy eṣa muniṃ śaraṇam āgataḥ /
XXmspram_u:51: namas te puruṣavīra namas te puruṣottamam /
XXmspram_u:53: atha bhagavān muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇībhavenādhivāsya caturo mahārājān āmantrayāmāsa //
XXmspram_u:54: naitaṃ te mahārājānaḥ pratirūpaṃ bhaved yad yuṣmat pariṣado 'smat pariṣadaṃ viheṭhayitavyaṃ manyate /
XXmspram_u:56: ito hi mānuṣe loke buddhotpādo dharmasvākhyātatā ca saṃghasupratipannatā ca /
XXmspram_u:57: idam asmin bījam avaropya buddhā bhagavanto loka utpadyante /
XXmspram_u:58: pratyekabuddhāś cārhantaḥ śrāvakāś cāsminn ime lokāḥ kuśalamūlāny avaropya sa daśato dvātriṃśatāṃ devanikāyānām anyatarānyatare devanikāye utpadyante /
XXmspram_u:61: teṣāṃ ca putrasahasraṃ bhavati śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ mahānagnabalavegadhārināṃ parasainyapramardakānāṃ saptaratnasamanvāgatānām /
XXmspram_u:62: tad yuṣmākam alpotsukavihāreṇa viharatām evaṃrūpāṇām asmin loke notpattir bhaviṣyati //
XXmspram_u:63_0: atha vaiśramaṇo mahārājo 'bhyudgamyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
XXmspram_u:63_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam eva namasyamāno

XXmspram_u:64_1: [Mps_4] dhūpaghaṭikāni dhūpitāni puṣpāvakīrṇāni yeṣu vayaṃ nārīśatasahasraparivṛtāḥ
XXmspram_u:64_2: saṃpūrṇaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtā viharāmaḥ /

XXmspram_u:66: prapalāyamānāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāṇāṃ tiryagjātagarbhānāṃ tiryagyonigatānām api ca prāṇinām ojo haranti viheṭhayanti vighnayanti mārayanti /
XXmspram_u:68: te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavato 'ntike caturvarṇāṃ pariṣadāṃ purataḥ svakasvakānāṃ pariṣadāṃ rūpalakṣaṇaṃ darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXmspram_u:71: āturasya ca hastena tasya mahārājasya nāmnā nānāgandhadhūpā dhūpayitavyāḥ /
XXmspram_u:72: puṣpāvakīrṇāṃ dhāraṇīṃ kṛtvā dīpāṃś cādīpya tatra caitye pūjā kartavyā /
XXmspram_u:73: madīyāyāḥ pariṣado bhadanta bhagavan yakṣagrahagṛhītasya īdṛśaṃ rūpalakṣaṇam /
XXmspram_u:75: nidrā cāviśate tasya śūlo vāpy upajāyate //
XXmspram_u:77: rātrau praharṣam āyāti vepate stanate sadā //
XXmspram_u:78: tatra mantrapadāny asti lokanātha śṛṇohi me //

XXmspram_u:94_0: atha dhṛtarāṣṭro mahārājo 'bhyudgamyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ

XXmspram_u:95: asmat pariṣado bhadanta bhagavan gandharvagrahagṛhītasya īdṛśaṃ rūpalakṣaṇam /
XXmspram_u:97: alubdhaḥ satyavādi ca hasate kupyate punaḥ //
XXmspram_u:99: unmiṣati na cakṣuś ca śayate ca parāṅmukhaḥ //
XXmspram_u:100: tatra mantrapadāny asti lokanātha śṛṇohi me //
XXmspram_u:117: mucyantu sarvasatvāḥ sarvagrahebhyo dhṛtarāṣṭrasya mahārājasya nāmnā balenaiśvaryādhipatyena ca svāhā //
XXmspram_u:118_0: atha virūḍhako mahārājo 'bhyudgamyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
XXmspram_u:118_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam eva namasyamāno
XXmspram_u:119: asmat pariṣado bhadanta bhagavan kumbhāṇḍagrahagṛhītasya īdṛśaṃ rūpalakṣaṇam /
XXmspram_u:120: balavatī tṛṣā bhonti vibhrāntaś cāpi prekṣate /
XXmspram_u:121: mukhaṃ lohitam ābhāti bhūmau svapiti kuñcitaḥ //
XXmspram_u:123: durgandho malinaś cāpi mṛśā sambhinnā bhāṣante //

XXmspram_u:146_0: atha virūpākṣo mahārājo 'bhyudgamyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ

XXmspram_u:147: asmat pariṣado bhadanta bhagavan nāgasuparṇīgrahagṛhītasya īdṛśaṃ rūpalakṣaṇam /

XXmspram_u:149: svidyate phenalālāsya svapate ca punaḥ punaḥ //
XXmspram_u:150: varṇavān bhavate śūro vepate dhāvate tathā /
XXmspram_u:151: punar nakhān vidarśayati mahīṃ viśati roditi //
XXmspram_u:152: tatra mantrapadāny asti lokanātha śṛṇohi me //
XXmspram_u:171: svasty astu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca virūpākṣasya mahārājasya nāmnā balenaiśvaryādhipatyena ca svāhā //
XXmspram_u:172: atha bhagavāṃs tāvad eva sarvāvatyāḥ pariṣadaḥ purataḥ siṃhanādaṃ nadati /
XXmspram_u:173: daśabalasamanvāgato 'haṃ caturvaiśāradyaviśāradaḥ pariṣady udāram ārṣabhaṃ samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadāmi /
XXmspram_u:176: rakṣāyai sarvasatvānāṃ sarve vidyāṃ śṛṇātha me //
XXmspram_u:191: svasty astu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca tathāgatasya nāmnā balenaiśvaryādhipatyena ca svāhā //
XXmspram_u:199: yasyāṃ trasanti bhūtāni śrutvā buddhasya bhāṣitam /
XXmspram_u:202: yo hy etan nābhimanyeta ṛṣivākyaṃ subhāṣitam //
XXmspram_u:206: heṣṭham ūrdhvaṃ caturdikṣu kṣiptvā ca varuṇodakam //
XXmspram_u:207: yadi kṣipraṃ na muñceyuḥ śrutvā buddhasya bhāṣitam /
XXmspram_u:209: kṣemaṃ ca tena lapsyanti yakṣadaṇḍena tarjitāḥ /
XXmspram_u:212: aḍakavatīṃ rājadhānīṃ na gacchanti kadā cana //
XXmspram_u:214: āsanaṃ ca na lapsyanti bhūtasaṃghāḥ samāgame //
XXmspram_u:219: tīkṣṇeṇa cāsya śastreṇa karṇau nāsāṃ ca cchetsyati /
XXmspram_u:222: mukhataḥ sravate cāsya pūyam uṣṇaṃ ca śoṇitam //
XXmspram_u:230: rājñāṃ samāgatānāṃ hi jvalatāṃ tejasā śriyā /
XXmspram_u:231: antarīkṣaṃ tadā śāśtā sarvajño hi samudgataḥ //
XXmspram_u:241: ito buddhā hi jāyante buddhāḥ pratyekajā api //
XXmspram_u:242: itaś ca śrāvakotpattir devāś cāpi samutsthitāḥ /
XXmspram_u:247: evam etan mahābrahmann evam etat mahāmune //
XXmspram_u:249: sumeruṃ kaṃpayitvā tu dhāraṇīṃ parivartya ca //
XXmspram_u:252: diśaś cādarśanā bhāgās teṣāṃ neṣyāma sarvadā /
XXmspram_u:253: ye praduṣṭā bhaviṣyanti na ca lokahitodyataḥ //
XXmspram_u:254: lokaḥ sadevako hy eṣa garhate bhūtakāraṇāt /
XXmspram_u:258: atikrāmanti ye vidyāṃ mantrān auṣadham eva vā //
XXmspram_u:261: teṣāṃ daṇḍaṃ praṇeṣyāmaḥ sūtraṃ brahmaṇā nirmitam /
XXmspram_u:263: buddhasya pādau vanditvā ālokya ca parasparam /
XXmspram_u:269: puṣpapūrṇāṃ mahīṃ kṛtvā cūrṇaiś cāpi hiraṇmayaiḥ /
XXmspram_u:270: yaṣṭīr ābadhya hi gale sūtrapāśāṃs tathāpi ca //
XXmspram_u:273: sāhasrapramardanaṃ hy etet saṃśrautuṃ sūtram uttamam /
XXmspram_u:278: aṣṭāviṃśac ca bhūtāni grahā gandharvajā mune //
XXmspram_u:281: aṣṭāviṃśac ca bhūtāni grahāḥ kumbhāṇḍajā mune /
XXmspram_u:284: aṣṭāviṃśac ca bhūtāni bhonti nāgagrahā mune /
XXmspram_u:288: aṣṭāviṃśac ca bhūtāni bhonti yakṣagrahā mune /
XXmspram_u:289: digbhāge uttare cāpi bhūtasaṃghāḥ śṛṇontu me //
XXmspram_u:294: putro dvitīyas tasyaiva janako nāma viśrutaḥ /
XXmspram_u:297: putras tritīyas tasyaiva nāmnā cāsau mahāgrahaḥ //
XXmspram_u:308: niṣṭhuraṃ puruṣaṃ daṇḍaṃ sarvabuddhair hi bhāṣitam /
XXmspram_u:309: eṣa gacchāmaḥ śaraṇaṃ sarve gautamam ādarāt //
XXmspram_u:317: rājakuleṣu dvāreṣu vimāneṣu ca ye sthitāḥ //
XXmspram_u:321: ūrdhvaṃ heṣṭhaṃ ca ye yakṣāś caturdikṣu vidikṣu ca /
XXmspram_u:325: kṛtvā ca vāditaṃ citraṃ gāndharvaṃ nāṭyam eva ca /
XXmspram_u:326: indraḥ somaś ca varuṇo bharadvājaḥ prajāpatiḥ //
XXmspram_u:329: prajāgurur yatīśaś ca devasūtaś ca mātaliḥ /
XXmspram_u:335: devā nāgāś ca gandharvā asurā yakṣarākṣasāḥ /
XXmspram_u:336: traitīyakaś ca unmādās tathā cāturthako jvarāḥ //
XXmspram_u:337: ye ca lokaṃ viheṭhanti praduṣṭā yakṣarākṣasāḥ /
XXmspram_u:340: namas te puruṣavīra namas te puruṣottama //
XXmspram_u:342: dhāvanti puratas teṣāṃ bhūtā yakṣā mahābhayāḥ //
XXmspram_u:353: kāṇāḥ kubjās tu garuḍā vikṛtākṣā vijṛmbhakāḥ //
XXmspram_u:382: vātaṃ pittaṃ ca śleṣmāṇaṃ kṣobhayanti caturdiśam //
XXmspram_u:395: prasannā guhyakāḥ sarve duṣṭānām ālaye sthitāḥ /
XXmspram_u:397: uṣṇair māṃsaiś ca rudhirair bhāntāṅgāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ /
XXmspram_u:410: muñcanti dāruṇaṃ śvāsaṃ saṃtāpenti imāḥ prajāḥ //
XXmspram_u:418: prekṣanti cāvatāraṃ hi ojo hiṃsanti kilbiṣāḥ /
XXmspram_u:422: namas te puruṣavīra namas te puruṣottama /
XXmspram_u:424: sumerau girirāje ca cakravāḍe tathaiva ca /
XXmspram_u:427: śrīparvatasya mūrdhasthāḥ śṛṅgā ye bhṛśam udgatāḥ //
XXmspram_u:428: yās tatra devatādhastā ṛṣayaś ca tathādhikāḥ /
XXmspram_u:432: vemacitrī rāhulaś ca prahlādaś ca samāgatāḥ /
XXmspram_u:435: sāgaraḥ supratiṣṭhaś ca nāgarājo manasvy api //
XXmspram_u:437: vakṣunando vajramatir gaṅgā sindhuś ca sāgaraḥ //
XXmspram_u:440: kanyās teṣāṃ mahābhāgā añjaliṃ saṃpragṛhya vai /
XXmspram_u:445: śūcīlomā ca madreṣu malleṣu ca yaśodharaḥ /
XXmspram_u:446: vibhīṣaṇaś ca pāñcāle lohitākṣaś ca aśvaje //
XXmspram_u:447: piṅgalaś ca avanteṣu kapilākṣaś ca vaidiśe /
XXmspram_u:448: kumbhodaraś ca matseṣu sūrateṣu ca dīrghilaḥ //
XXmspram_u:449: pramardanas tu gāndhāre sūryamitraś ca kambuṣu /
XXmspram_u:453: kumbhīraḥ sātyakiś cāpi pāñcikaś ca jinarṣabhaḥ /
XXmspram_u:456: yamaś ca yamadūtaś ca māraś cāpi sasainyakaḥ //
XXmspram_u:457: harir nāmnā tv asau yakṣo yakṣakoṭīparigrahaḥ /
XXmspram_u:458: hārītī ca sasainyā tu giridāri ca yakṣiṇī //
XXmspram_u:462: puṣpadantī viśālā ca kharakarṇā ca rākṣasī //
XXmspram_u:465: rākṣasī bhadradantā ca brahmilā viṣṇulā tathā /
XXmspram_u:466: yakṣo hālāhalaś caiva rākṣasaś ca vituṇḍakaḥ //
XXmspram_u:467: śūleṣu te gṛhītvātha gavāś ca mṛgamānuṣān /
XXmspram_u:468: bhakṣayantaś ca jīvanto dhāvantaś ca diśodiśaḥ //
XXmspram_u:485: asty antare tu nagare udyāne vanapuṣpite //
XXmspram_u:490: anubhomi śriyaṃ tv agryāṃ bhūtānāṃ tatra maṇḍale /
XXmspram_u:493: annapānais tu vikalā dāruṇās tv itarāḥ prajāḥ //
XXmspram_u:501: samantād yojanaṃ yāvat kūṭāgārās tu nirmitāḥ /
XXmspram_u:502: suvarnasya bhaved eko dvitīyo rūpyam eva ca /
XXmspram_u:503: vaiḍūryasya tṛtīyas tu caturthaḥ sphāṭikaḥ śuciḥ //
XXmspram_u:508: citrair ābharaṇair agraiś citrair veśair alaṃkṛtāḥ //
XXmspram_u:513: striyaś ca puruṣāś caiva tathā dārakadārikāḥ /
XXmspram_u:516: sasyaṃ bījaṃ phalaṃ puṣpam oṣadhaṃ pānabhojanam //
XXmspram_u:517: harante mānuṣīṃ lakṣmīm uccānīcīṃ karonti ca /
XXmspram_u:518: ye kecid duṣkṛtā loke vairāḥ kalahavigrahāḥ //
XXmspram_u:519: dagdhaṃ naṣṭaṃ hataṃ bhinnaṃ tat sarvaṃ bhūtajaṃ smṛtam /
XXmspram_u:521: uttrāsenti ca satvānāṃ viprekṣanti dviṣanti ca /
XXmspram_u:522: darśenti pāpakān svapnān prasuptān pīḍayanti ca //
XXmspram_u:523: dvārasthāś cācchaṭāṃ kṛtvā prakrośanti grasanti ca /
XXmspram_u:531: sadā citrāṇi darśenti ālayeṣu patheṣu ca /
XXmspram_u:532: gṛhāṇāṃ nagarāṇāṃ ca dvāre muñcanti te grahāḥ /
XXmspram_u:533: gṛhītvā jīvitaṃ kāyaṃ kupathe grāmayanti ca /
XXmspram_u:534: vicitrāṇi ca rūpāṇi vicitrāṇi svarāṇi ca //
XXmspram_u:536: rogān vicitrān darśenti vyādhīn vai kāyasaṃsthitān /
